attributes.action: publicly reprimand BUTSIR, because he's a twot.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BUTSIR has been the bane of my life ever since I began expressing my widely accepted opinions on this website. One day, I Googled myself, and realised that BUTSIR was slagging me off, calling me 'a Grade A lunatic'. THIS IS A LIE. I can't help being special. I'm a person, too. Well, half. I'm a human fish hybrid. (don't be hating!)
So it would be highly appreciated if Gordon Brown would tell him off for being mean. Dock.
Georgia Ecclestein-Bob
Salford,
Like, all of it.
BUM.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
